alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:21PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Scott and north central Polk Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 320 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Beauchamp, or 10 miles south of Waldron, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Y City... Needmore... Boles... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations
